workout_groups.name: Meditation
workout_groups.description: Cultivate mindfulness, relaxation, and mental discipline through meditation practices.

workouts.name: Guided Meditation
workouts.description: Follow an audio-guided meditation session for relaxation and clarity.

workouts.name: Breath Awareness Meditation
workouts.description: Focus only on the rhythm of your breath, maintaining stillness.

workouts.name: Mantra Meditation
workouts.description: Repeat a personal or traditional mantra to cultivate inner peace.

workouts.name: Silent Observation
workouts.description: Sit in complete silence, observing thoughts without engaging in them.

workouts.name: Deep Tranquility Practice
workouts.description: Meditate with the goal of reaching a fully relaxed, thoughtless state.

workout_groups.name: Advanced Meditation Techniques
workout_groups.description: Deepen meditative practice with techniques that push the mind beyond conventional mindfulness training.

workouts.name: Void Meditation
workouts.description: Enter a state of complete mental emptiness, silencing all internal thought for an extended period.

workouts.name: Sensory Deprivation Training
workouts.description: Meditate in a completely dark and silent room, removing all external sensory input.

workouts.name: Hyper Awareness Meditation
workouts.description: Expand awareness to register every micro-movement, breath, and environmental detail.

workouts.name: Breath Suspension Meditation
workouts.description: Meditate while holding your breath for extended durations, mastering breath control in stillness.

workouts.name: Pain Tolerance Meditation
workouts.description: Sit with mild physical discomfort (ice, stretching, or stillness) while maintaining complete relaxation.

workout_groups.name: Psi Meditation Techniques
workout_groups.description: Access non-ordinary states of consciousness through deep psionic meditation practices.

workouts.name: Psionic Void Immersion
workouts.description: Enter a full void state where individual identity dissolves, aligning with higher intelligence.

workouts.name: Cosmic Harmonic Resonance
workouts.description: Meditate while aligning your consciousness to the vibrational resonance of cosmic forces.

workouts.name: Temporal Slipstream Meditation
workouts.description: Meditate on the fluidity of time, allowing perception to detach from linear constraints.

workouts.name: Akashic Stream Synchronization
workouts.description: Align with the Akashic records and download information beyond ordinary cognition.
